description: Eastern Province - Appocinted Hon. Ahamed Nazeer Zainulabdeen as Chief Minister and the Provincial Minister for Finance and Planning etc; Hon. Ibrahim Mohamed Mohamed Mansoor as the Provincial Minister for Health etc; Hon. Kirushnapillai Thurairasasingam as the Provincial Minister for Agriculture etc; Hon. Singaravelu Thandauthayapani as the Provincial Minister for Education etc; Hon. Ariyawathy Galappaththy as the Provincial Minister for Road Development etc w.e.f. 03.03.2015
